48.ara-name: كتاب الدعوات عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abdullah bin Busr (ra) narrated that:A man said: “O Messenger of Allah (ﷺ), indeed, the legislated acts of Islam have become too much for me, so inform me of a thing that I should stick to.” He (ﷺ) said: “Let not your tongue cease to be moist with the remembrance of Allah.”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي فَضْلِ الذِّكْرِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related Regarding The Virtue Of Remembrance
